TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecific extends System.Web.UI.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供建構，用以在 [<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) 項目的多個內容替代選擇中指定一個選項。

span.span: Provides a construct for specifying a choice among multiple content alternatives in the [<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內[ \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)項目，您通常會指定一或多個[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目，每個都包含屬性 (attribute) 指定如何評估選項針對目標裝置的功能。Within a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, you typically specify one or more [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements, each containing attributes that specify how to evaluate the choice against target device capabilities. 在執行階段，每個選項會評估順序，而且成功評估的第一個選擇使用。At run time, each choice is evaluated in order, and the first choice that is successfully evaluated is used. DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構用來指定範本設定，並覆寫屬性。比方說，它可用來指定裝置的特定映像控制項。The DeviceSpecific/Choice construct is used to specify template sets and override properties; for example, it can be used to specify device-specific images for the control. > [!NOTE] > 即使類別繼承自 Web Form`System.Web.UI.Control`命名空間，這是僅實作詳細資料。Even though the class inherits from the Web Forms `System.Web.UI.Control` namespace, this is only an implementation detail. A``項目行為就像控制項一樣。A `` element does not behave like a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和物件，以建立行動裝置的表單中的各種裝置的特定介面。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects to create interfaces specific to a variety of devices in a mobile form. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 所有上述程式碼都可以使用下列標記以宣告方式取代：All of the code above can be replaced declaratively with the following markup: 這些範例中，對於 Web.config 檔案必須包含下列項目：For these examples, the Web.config file must have the following elements:

The collection of choices in a element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，會儲存順序來評估集合中的選項。At run time, the choices in the collection are evaluated in the order that they are stored. 如需選項和裝置的特定概念的詳細資訊，請參閱[\<選擇 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)項目。For more information about choice and device-specific concepts, see the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的 ASP.NET mobile Web 應用程式中定義的第一個篩選中所包含的範本數。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display the number of templates contained in the first filter defined in the ASP.NET mobile Web application. 如需更完整的程式碼範例，請參閱範例概觀。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用停用頁面的檢視狀態管理屬性指示詞，或您可以停用檢視狀態在個別控制項上的設定其個別屬性。You can disable view-state management for the page by using the attribute of the directive, or you can disable view state on individual controls by setting their individual properties.

The currently selected choice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用一個 DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構來指定裝置的特定內容，例如屬性覆寫或範本，為控制項或樣式。You can use a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct to specify device-specific content, such as property overrides or templates, for a control or style. 中的選項中選擇要[ \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)項目，ASP.NET 會評估每一種選擇循序排序所依據的目標裝置的功能。To select a choice from the choices in a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, ASP.NET evaluates each choice in sequential order against the capabilities of the target device. 第一個符合的選項進行選取的選項，並使用裝置特定內容。The first matching choice is made the selected choice, and is used for device-specific content. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示與目前選項相關聯的篩選。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the filter associated with the current choice. 如需更完整的程式碼範例，請參閱範例概觀。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview.
